words.defineEn: an official rule or order that is imposed by the law or someone with authority

examples: But it's not just about clearing unexploded ordnance.

He has publicly acknowledged the economy is not his strong point.

The student worked multiple jobs to pay off her student loans, acknowledging that debt is the worst poverty.
words.defineEn: to accept something as true or real
words.defineVi: để chấp nhận một cái gì đó là đúng hoặc thực

examples: There will be some acknowledgment of it.

words.defineVi: một tuyên bố thừa nhận một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó

words.defineVi: sự bất đồng giữa những người dự kiến sẽ hợp tác

This is not dissent.
This is not dissent.
and he was all about dissent.

words.defineVi: theo đuổi niềm vui như một vấn đề của nguyên tắc đạo đức

examples: People with addiction can sometimes be stigmatized as pleasure-bound hedonists who have no self-control, but people often compulsively use substances or do things in reaction to stress and other psychological problems.
